INSERT INTO YE160401 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_YYMM , ELCT_DATE , SUPR_TXAM , BUAM_TXAM , INBS_AMNT , STCK_INAM , SPBM_TXAM , ECIN_TXAM , TAXM_ECIN , SPCI_HLTH , SPCI_EMPF , NATN_PSNF , EARN_TAXN , IHTX_TAXN , NNKS_SSUM , ETCC_TXAM , ETCC_ETAM , PAY_PYMT_SUM_TOT_AMNT , PAY_PYMT_FREE_DTY_SUM , CURR_WORK_FREE_DTUS_AMNT , CURR_WORK_EMPTK_WDRW_SUM , CURR_WORK_ECTE_RETCE_SUM , CURR_WORK_RCP_INSUR_SUM , CURR_WORK_RCP_AGGR_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , AA.SYSTEMKEY , BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH , '' AS ELCT_DATE , ( NVL( ( SELECT SUM(TXTN_TOT_AMNT) FROM PAYR0301 A01 WHERE A01.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A01.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A01.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY), 0) )AS SUPR_TXAM , (0) AS BUAM_TXAM , (0) AS INBS_AMNT , (0) AS STCK_INAM , ( NVL( ( SELECT SUM(TXTN_TOT_AMNT) FROM PAYR0301 A01 WHERE A01.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A01.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A01.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY),0) )AS SPBM_TXAM , (0) AS ECIN_TXAM , (0) AS TAXM_ECIN , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD IN ('D0010100','D0010200','D0010300' ,'D0010400' ,'D0010500' ,'D0110100' ,'D0110200' ,'D0110300' ,'D0110400' ,'D0110500')) , 0) AS SPCI_HLTH , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD IN ('D0160100','D0160200','D0160300') ) , 0) AS SPCI_EMPF , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD IN ('D0150100','D0150200','D0150300') ) , 0) AS NATN_PSNF , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD = 'T0010100') , 0) AS EARN_TAXN , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD = 'T0020100' ) ,0) AS IHTX_TAXN , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD = 'D0240100') , 0) AS NNKS_SSUM , (0) AS ETCC_TXAM , (0) AS ETCC_ETAM , BB.PAY_PYMT_DT , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(A01.PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A01 WHERE A01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND A01.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A01.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH ) , 0) AS PAY_PYMT_FREE_DTY_SUM , (0) AS CURR_WORK_FREE_DTUS_AMNT , (0) AS CURR_WORK_EMPTK_WDRW_SUM , (0) AS CURR_WORK_ECTE_RETCE_SUM , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD = 'D0110100') , 0) CURR_WORK_RCP_INSUR_SUM , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD IN ('D0160100','D0160200','D0160300') ) , 0) AS CURR_WORK_RCP_AGGR_SUM , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , #revnAddr# FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT AD02.DPOB_CD , AD02.SYSTEMKEY , AD02.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , AD02.EMYMT_DIV_CD , AD02.HAN_NM , AD02.RESN_REGN_NUM , DECODE (AD02.EMYMT_DIV_CD, 'A0020020', AD02.DEPT_CD,DECODE(AD01.EMYMT_DIV_CD,'A0020020',AD02.DEPT_CD,AD01.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD)) AS DEPT_CD ,DECODE (AD02.EMYMT_DIV_CD, 'A0020020', AD02.BUSIN_CD, DECODE(AD01.EMYMT_DIV_CD,'A0020020',AD02.BUSIN_CD,AD01.BUSIN_CD) ) AS BUSIN_CD , DECODE (AD02.EMYMT_DIV_CD, 'A0020020', AD02.TYP_OCCU_CD, DECODE(AD01.EMYMT_DIV_CD,'A0020020',AD02.TYP_OCCU_CD,AD01.TYP_OCCU_CD) ) AS TYP_OCCU_CD , DECODE (AD02.EMYMT_DIV_CD, 'A0020020', AD02.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, DECODE(AD01.EMYMT_DIV_CD,'A0020020',AD02.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,AD01.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD) ) AS DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , DECODE (AD02.EMYMT_DIV_CD, 'A0020020', AD02.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD, DECODE(AD01.EMYMT_DIV_CD,'A0020020',AD02.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD,AD01.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD) ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , DECODE (AD02.ODTY_CD,AD01.ODTY_CD, AD01.ODTY_CD,AD01.ODTY_CD) AS ODTY_CD , DECODE (AD02.PYSP_CD, AD01.PYSP_CD, AD01.PYSP_CD, AD01.PYSP_CD) AS PYSP_CD , DECODE (AD02.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, AD01.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, AD01.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, AD01.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , DECODE (AD02.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, AD01.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, AD01.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, AD01.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD , DECODE (AD02.FRST_EMYMT_DT, AD01.FRST_EMYMT_DT, AD01.FRST_EMYMT_DT, AD01.FRST_EMYMT_DT) AS FRST_EMYMT_DT , DECODE (AD02.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, AD01.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, AD01.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, AD01.EMYMT_BGNN_DT) AS EMYMT_BGNN_DT , DECODE (AD02.EMYMT_END_DT, AD01.EMYMT_END_DT, AD01.EMYMT_END_DT, AD01.EMYMT_END_DT) AS EMYMT_END_DT , AD01.NATN_CD , AD01.HDOFC_CODTN_CD , AD01.RETRY_DT
FROM PSNL0100 AD01 , (SELECT DPOB_CD, PYMT_YR_MNTH, SYSTEMKEY, PAYR_SEIL_NUM, PAY_CD, PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD, EMYMT_DIV_CD, HAN_NM, RESN_REGN_NUM, DEPT_CD, BUSIN_CD, TYP_OCCU_CD, DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, ODTY_CD, PYSP_CD, LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, FRST_EMYMT_DT, EMYMT_BGNN_DT, EMYMT_END_DT, HDOFC_DIV_CD, RETRY_DT FROM (SELECT DPOB_CD, PYMT_YR_MNTH, SYSTEMKEY, PAYR_SEIL_NUM, PAY_CD, PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD, EMYMT_DIV_CD, HAN_NM, RESN_REGN_NUM, DEPT_CD, BUSIN_CD, TYP_OCCU_CD, DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, ODTY_CD, PYSP_CD, LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, FRST_EMYMT_DT, EMYMT_BGNN_DT, EMYMT_END_DT, HDOFC_DIV_CD, RETRY_DT FROM PAYR0304 UNION ALL SELECT DPOB_CD, PYYT_YR_MNTH, SYSTEMKEY, (0) AS PAYR_SEIL_NUM,('B0150000') AS PAY_CD, PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD, EMYMT_DIV_CD, HAN_NM, RESN_REGN_NUM, DEPT_CD, BUSIN_CD, TYP_OCCU_CD, DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, ODTY_CD, PYSP_CD, LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, FRST_EMYMT_DT, EMYMT_BGNN_DT, EMYMT_END_DT, HDOFC_DIV_CD, RETRY_DT FROM PYYT0304)) AD02 , ( SELECT NN.DPOB_CD, NN.PYMT_YR_MNTH, NN.PAY_CD, NN.SYSTEMKEY, NN.PAYR_SEIL_NUM FROM (SELECT DPOB_CD, PYMT_YR_MNTH, PAY_CD, SYSTEMKEY, MAX(PAYR_SEIL_NUM) AS PAYR_SEIL_NUM FROM (SELECT DPOB_CD, PYMT_YR_MNTH, SYSTEMKEY, PAYR_SEIL_NUM, PAY_CD, PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD, EMYMT_DIV_CD, HAN_NM, RESN_REGN_NUM, DEPT_CD, BUSIN_CD, TYP_OCCU_CD, DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, ODTY_CD, PYSP_CD, LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, FRST_EMYMT_DT, EMYMT_BGNN_DT, EMYMT_END_DT, HDOFC_DIV_CD, RETRY_DT FROM PAYR0304 UNION ALL SELECT DPOB_CD, PYYT_YR_MNTH, SYSTEMKEY, (0) AS PAYR_SEIL_NUM,('B0150000') AS PAY_CD, PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD, EMYMT_DIV_CD, HAN_NM, RESN_REGN_NUM, DEPT_CD, BUSIN_CD, TYP_OCCU_CD, DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, ODTY_CD, PYSP_CD, LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD, LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD, FRST_EMYMT_DT, EMYMT_BGNN_DT, EMYMT_END_DT, HDOFC_DIV_CD, RETRY_DT FROM PYYT0304) PAYR0304 WHERE PYMT_YR_MNTH LIKE #yrtxBlggYr# ||'%' GROUP BY DPOB_CD, PYMT_YR_MNTH, PAY_CD, SYSTEMKEY ) NN, ( SELECT MM.DPOB_CD, MM.PYMT_YR_MNTH , MM.PAY_CD , MM.SYSTEMKEY , MM.PAYR_SEIL_NUM , MM.SEL_NUM FROM ( SELECT SEL_NUM, DPOB_CD, PYMT_YR_MNTH , PAY_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PAYR_SEIL_NUM FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY, PYMT_YR_MNTH ASC, PAY_CD ASC, PAYR_SEIL_NUM DESC) AS SEL_NUM, DPOB_CD, PYMT_YR_MNTH , PAY_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PAYR_SEIL_NUM FROM PAYR0304 WHERE PYMT_YR_MNTH LIKE #yrtxBlggYr# ||'%' AND (SYSTEMKEY,PYMT_YR_MNTH) IN ( SELECT SYSTEMKEY, MAX(PYMT_YR_MNTH) FROM PAYR0304 NNAA WHERE NNAA.DPOB_CD = PAYR0304.DPOB_CD AND NNAA.PYMT_YR_MNTH = PAYR0304.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND NNAA.SYSTEMKEY = PAYR0304.SYSTEMKEY AND NNAA.PYMT_YR_MNTH LIKE #yrtxBlggYr# ||'%' GROUP BY SYSTEMKEY ) ) ORDER BY SEL_NUM DESC ) MM WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
) GG WHERE NN.DPOB_CD = GG.DPOB_CD AND NN.SYSTEMKEY = GG.SYSTEMKEY AND NN.PYMT_YR_MNTH = GG.PYMT_YR_MNTH /* AND NN.PAY_CD = GG.PAY_CD AND NN.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = GG.PAYR_SEIL_NUM */ ) AD03 WHERE AD02.DPOB_CD = AD01.DPOB_CD AND AD02.SYSTEMKEY = AD01.SYSTEMKEY AND AD02.DPOB_CD = AD03.DPOB_CD AND AD02.PYMT_YR_MNTH = AD03.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND AD02.SYSTEMKEY = AD03.SYSTEMKEY AND AD02.PAY_CD = AD03.PAY_CD AND AD02.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = AD03.PAYR_SEIL_NUM AND AD02.PYMT_YR_MNTH LIKE #yrtxBlggYr# ||'%' ) AA , ( SELECT DISTINCT AC01.DPOB_CD, AC01.PYMT_YR_MNTH, AC01.SYSTEMKEY, AC01.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD, AC01.EMYMT_DIV_CD, AC01.HAN_NM, AC02.PAY_PYMT_DT FROM PAYR0304 AC01 ,( SELECT A03.DPOB_CD, A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH, A03.SYSTEMKEY ,MAX (A02.PAY_PYMT_DT) PAY_PYMT_DT FROM PAYR0300 A02 , PAYR0304 A03 WHERE A02.DPOB_CD = A03.DPOB_CD AND A02.PYMT_YR_MNTH = A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A02.PAY_CD = A03.PAY_CD AND A02.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = A03.PAYR_SEIL_NUM GROUP BY A03.DPOB_CD, A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH, A03.SYSTEMKEY ) AC02 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD = AC02.DPOB_CD AND AC01.PYMT_YR_MNTH = AC02.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AC02.SYSTEMKEY ) BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH LIKE #yrtxBlggYr# ||'%'
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,#yrtxBlggYr# ))) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = AA.DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(AA.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
)
AA.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
AA.TYP_OCCU_CD = #typOccuCd#
AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM (SELECT KF01.DPOB_CD , KF01.YRTX_BLGG_YR , KF01.CLUT_SEPT_CD , KF01.SYSTEMKEY FROM YE160401 KF01 ) KK01 WHERE KK01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND KK01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND KK01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND KK01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY)
)

INSERT INTO YE160401 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속연도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,ELCT_YYMM /* 지급년월 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,ELCT_DATE /* 급여지급일자 */ ,PAY_PYMT_SUM_TOT_AMNT /* 급여지급금액총액 */ ,PAY_PYMT_FREE_DTY_SUM /* 급여지급금액_비과세 */ ,SUPR_TXAM /* 급여지급금액_과세 */ ,CURR_WORK_FREE_DTUS_AMNT /* 현근무지상여금_비과세 */ ,BUAM_TXAM /* 현근무지상여금_과세 */ ,INBS_AMNT /* 현근무지인정상여금액 */ ,STCK_INAM /* 현근무지주식매수선택권행사이익금액 */ ,CURR_WORK_EMPTK_WDRW_SUM /* 현근무지우리사주조합인출금액 */ ,CURR_WORK_ECTE_RETCE_SUM /* 현근무지임원퇴직소득금액한도초과금액 */ ,ECIN_TXAM /* 외국인소득금액_과세 */ ,TAXM_ECIN /* 외국인소득금액_비과세 */ ,SPCI_HLTH /* 현근무지건강보험료금액 */ ,CURR_WORK_RCP_INSUR_SUM /* 현근무지요양보험료금액 */ ,CURR_WORK_RCP_AGGR_SUM /* 현근무지건강요양보험료합계금액 */ ,SPCI_EMPF /* 현근무지고용보험료금액 */ ,NATN_PSNF /* 현근무지국민연금금액 */ ,EARN_TAXN /* 현근무지소득세 */ ,IHTX_TAXN /* 현근무지지방소득세 */ ,NNKS_SSUM /* 현근무지농특세금액 */ ,ETCC_TXAM /* 현근무지기타금액_과세 */ ,ETCC_ETAM /* 현근무지기타금액_비과세 */ ,SPBM_TXAM /* 현근무지과세합계금액 */ ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) ( SELECT DISTINCT DPOB_CD , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , PYMT_YR_MNTH , SYSTEMKEY , PAY_PYMT_DT , PAY_PYMT_SUM_TOT_AMNT , PAY_PYMT_FREE_DTY_SUM , SUPR_TXAM , CURR_WORK_FREE_DTUS_AMNT , BUAM_TXAM , INBS_AMNT /* 현근무지인정상여금액 */ , STCK_INAM /* 현근무지주식매수선택권행사이익금액 */ , CURR_WORK_EMPTK_WDRW_SUM /* 현근무지우리사주조합인출금액 */ , CURR_WORK_ECTE_RETCE_SUM /* 현근무지임원퇴직소득금액한도초과금액 */ , ECIN_TXAM /* 외국인소득금액_과세 */ , TAXM_ECIN /* 외국인소득금액_비과세 */ , SPCI_HLTH , CURR_WORK_RCP_INSUR_SUM , CURR_WORK_RCP_AGGR_SUM , SPCI_EMPF , NATN_PSNF , EARN_TAXN , IHTX_TAXN , NNKS_SSUM , ETCC_TXAM , ETCC_ETAM , SPBM_TXAM , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , #revnAddr# FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD ,BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH ,AA.SYSTEMKEY , BB.PAY_PYMT_DT , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_TOT_AMNT) FROM PAYR0301 A01 WHERE A01.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A01.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A01.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY),0) AS PAY_PYMT_SUM_TOT_AMNT , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(FREE_DTY_TOT_AMNT) FROM PAYR0301 A01 WHERE A01.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A01.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A01.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY),0) AS PAY_PYMT_FREE_DTY_SUM , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(TXTN_TOT_AMNT) FROM PAYR0301 A01 WHERE A01.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A01.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A01.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY),0) AS SUPR_TXAM ,(0) AS CURR_WORK_FREE_DTUS_AMNT , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD = 'C9010010'),0) AS BUAM_TXAM ,(0) AS INBS_AMNT /* 현근무지인정상여금액 */ ,(0) AS STCK_INAM /* 현근무지주식매수선택권행사이익금액 */ ,(0) AS CURR_WORK_EMPTK_WDRW_SUM /* 현근무지우리사주조합인출금액 */ ,(0) AS CURR_WORK_ECTE_RETCE_SUM /* 현근무지임원퇴직소득금액한도초과금액 */ ,(0) AS ECIN_TXAM /* 외국인소득금액_과세 */ ,(0) AS TAXM_ECIN /* 외국인소득금액_비과세 */ , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD IN ( 'D0010100','D0010200','D0010300' ,'D0010400','D0010500' ) ),0) AS SPCI_HLTH
, NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD IN ( 'D0110100' ,'D0110200','D0110300','D0110400','D0110500' ) ),0) AS CURR_WORK_RCP_INSUR_SUM
, NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD IN ( 'D0010100','D0010200','D0010300' ,'D0010400','D0010500','D0110100' ,'D0110200','D0110300','D0110400','D0110500' ) ),0) AS CURR_WORK_RCP_AGGR_SUM
, NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD IN ('D0160100','D0160200','D0160300' ) ),0) AS SPCI_EMPF , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD IN ( 'D0150100','D0150200','D0150300' ) ),0) AS NATN_PSNF
